Text.Page: Dulari and his staff taught you how to train new skills.

I trust you've seen by now that this island is no normal place. The ghilliedhus, the structures to the south, and further on there's the...well let's just say you'll be no use to us if you're dead.

Making the island safe for future researchers is your top priority now. Junia over there will teach you how to be a better .

Welcome! You look like you're ready to learn a new skill.

If you're wondering how, it's simple! Every time you can learn a new skill (usually when reaching an even level), the Skills icon on the Menu bar updates. Either open your Skill window (K) to select your new skill, or visit a class master or instructor like myself and select Learn Skills. Pay for the training you want, and you're all set!

All right now, let's try it. Unless I miss my guess, the next skill a like you needs is Rain of Blows I.

Your path is set out before you: more and better skills as you earn more levels.

And use Rain of Blows I on some real enemies. Not only does it deliver impressive damage, but the sheer audacity of your attack will help protect you from incoming hits!

You learned Rain of Blows, but can you use it?

You've probably noticed all the {@linkcreature:13#300921#noruks} around here. Take out a few on your way south, and check in with Nivek at the base of the hill.
Hmm, these hides are...well, disgusting actually. But since it seems you have some skills, perhaps you can help us with a few other tasks. Good job, recruit!
